attributes.action: introduce a system whereby citizens have the choice to carry an Organ Donor Card (ODC).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be clearly displayed in chemists, doctors'surgeries,hospitals and enclosed with government leaflets. The object is to prevent healthy organs being cremated/buried when transplants of them could save the lives of thousands waiting for healthy organs. The cards should be carried at all times and countersigned by someone close who is also aware of the bearer's wishes. It should not be a compulsory requisite but wording in the petition should emphasize the dire need for transplants and how they can save the lives of many who, without a transplant, will die.
